summary: Experienced and safety-focused heavy vehicle driver with over 20 years of experience in transporting passengers and goods safely, conducting vehicle inspections, and maintaining accurate logs. Skilled in electrical installations and has strong problem-solving skills and excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
